text: Zee Tamil is an Indian pay television Tamil language channel. It is owned by Zee Entertainment Enterprises. The channel started broadcasting on 2008 and is available internationally. ==Shows and Serials== ===Daily and Current Updates=== ;Tamil Serials * Rettai Roja Rettai Roja * Raja Magal Rajamagal * Endrendum Punnagai * Poove Poochoodava * Suryavamsam * Neethane Enthan Ponvasantham * Gokulathil Seethai * Yaaradi Nee Mohini * Sembaruthi * Oru Oorla Oru Rajakumari * Sathya ;Shows * Genes 3.0 * Tamizha Tamizha * Zee Super Family ==Availability== The channel available across India and other countries through satellite and cable. It also available through digital and mobile entertainment platform, ZEE5. ==References== Category:Tamil-language television Category:Television channels in India Category:2008 establishments in India
title: Zee Tamil
